title: Please let me know carriers in India supporting esim for Pixel 3a
content:
I have bought Pixel 3a xl.
A week back, I had written to Reliance Jio for support of esim on Pixel for which they wrote back saying they have starting supporting Pixel 3 devices. Does this mean that it also supports Pixel 3a devices. Please help.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
